Articles.Content:
I am having trouble with mechjeb worked perfectly in 2.5.0.0 but doesn't work anymore have no windows for ascent guidance and maneuvers or landing usimng steam and it has updated the game to latest version please help can't get a rocket to orbit my self efficiently

Mikey864

Hey I was having the same issue too, it's a bug with the most recent release of mechjeb. If you download the latest stable dev build version from [http://jenkins.mumech.com/job/MechJeb2/](http://jenkins.mumech.com/job/MechJeb2/) it resolved the issue I was having.
